pages.text: Use $(l:agito/items/g3core)Blank G-System Chips$(/l) on this block to obtain different G-Chips$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g3)G3 Chip$(/l) (27.8%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g3x)G3-X Chip$(/l) (8.3%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g3mild)G3 Mild Chip$(/l) (5.6%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g4)G4 Chip$(/l) (2.8%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#g1)G1 Chip$(/l) (27.8%)$(li)$(l:agito/items/g_system_chips#v1)V1 Chip$(/l) (27.8%)
